title: Celestial Beacon of the Dragon Tempest
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), (hyperdetailed), epic vertical concept art, Fantasy Xianxia style, A towering ancient lighthouse made of white stone, standing atop a massive floating island of gnarled, glowing teal roots and giant cyan crystals. The scene is engulfed in a severe, dramatic lightning storm over a turbulent, dark ocean. Heavy rain and intense lightning streaks illuminate the scene. A solitary cultivator figure stands at the apex, emitting a brilliant, swirling heavenly vortex of light. Ethereal white Chinese dragons (Lung) circle amongst the dark, spiraling storm clouds. Glowing runes (Chinese script) etched into the base. Dynamic composition, 9:16 aspect ratio.
